ISSUE.TITLE: Add some missing locales
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70.5 > I tried nopCommerce 4.70.5 no source x64 version with fresh installation and Brevo configuration but saw this warning in log. > > ``` > Log level > Warning > Short message > Resource string (admin.configuration.emailaccounts.fields.tenantid.required) is not found. Language ID = 1 > Full message > IP address > 162.158.86.169 > Customer > Page URL > https://docs.nopadvance.com/Admin/EmailAccount/Edit/2 > Referrer URL > https://docs.nopadvance.com/Admin/EmailAccount/Edit/2 > Created on > 8/29/2024 5:03:23 AM > ``` Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/100707/resource-string-missing-adminconfigurationemailaccountsfieldstenantidrequired Let's check all locales that were added in #7031
